sets.name: Striking Set 1
sets.intro: From a horse stance — a progressive striking drill that pairs thrust punches with follow-up back-knuckles, hammer fists, and inward strikes across multiple lines.

sets.title: SET 1: Striking Set 1 — From a Horse Stance

steps.text: Right horizontal thrust punch to face level into right back-knuckle to face level.
Left horizontal thrust punch to face level into left back-knuckle to face level.
Right horizontal thrust punch to face level into right inverted hammer-fist to groin.
Left horizontal thrust punch to face level into left inverted hammer-fist to groin.
Right horizontal thrust punch to face level into right back-knuckle to temple.
Left horizontal thrust punch to face level into left back-knuckle to temple.
Right horizontal thrust punch to face level into right inward hammer-fist to ribs.
Left horizontal thrust punch to face level into left inward hammer-fist to ribs.
Right vertical thrust punch to face level into right back-knuckle to face level.
Left vertical thrust punch to face level into left back-knuckle to face level.
Right vertical thrust punch to face level into right inverted hammer-fist to groin.
Left vertical thrust punch to face level into left inverted hammer-fist to groin.
Right vertical thrust punch to face level into right back-knuckle to temple.
Left vertical thrust punch to face level into left back-knuckle to temple.
Right vertical thrust punch to face level into right inward hammer-fist to ribs.
Left vertical thrust punch to face level into left inward hammer-fist to ribs.
Double horizontal thrust punch to face level into double back-knuckles to face level.
Double horizontal thrust punch to face level into double inverted hammer-fists to groin.
Double horizontal thrust punch to face level into double back-knuckles to temple.
Double horizontal thrust punch to face level into double inward hammer-fists to ribs.
Double vertical thrust punch to face level into double back-knuckles to face level.
Double vertical thrust punch to face level into double inverted hammer-fists to groin.
Double vertical thrust punch to face level into double back-knuckles to temple.
Double vertical thrust punch to face level into double inward hammer-fists to ribs.
Slide left foot to right foot (knees bent), strike forward with double horizontal thrust punches to face level.
Double back-knuckles at face level.
Double inverted hammer-fists to groin.
Double back-knuckles to temple.
Double inward hammer-fists to ribs.
Return to attention stance.

footerNotes: Maintain a strong horse stance: knees bent, weight centered, feet shoulder-width apart.
Drive through the hips and shoulders on thrusts; recover to guard quickly after each follow-up strike.
Keep strikes compact when following up to groin/temple/ribs—accuracy and structure over wild power.
Breathe on motion: exhale on the strike, reset on recovery.
